_comment: We don't want to check transitive classes, e.g. from kie-api, since we already check them in their own module.

annotated._comment: Everything with XML annotations is included.

_comment: ProtobufMessages should be excluded since it is a generated class and revapi doesn't handle it correctly.

revapi._comment: Changes between 6.5.0.Final and master. These changes are desired and thus ignored. They should be removed when 7.0.0.Final is available.
